Interface Cookies

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConvertibleValues<Cookie>, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,Cookie>>, ValueResolver<java.lang.CharSequence>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface Cookies
extends ConvertibleValues<Cookie>
    Models the defined Cookie instances in an application.
